weatherDev: The wheel was not reinvented. It is one more weather application, only that Weather App provides you with images of the place you have searched for.
Initially 3 APIs were working. Then I decided to make my own way to obtain the user's IP, so that when I entered I would obtain the information of where he lives. But I decided to only use 2.
